Effortlessly Centralize Your Jira Release Management

Are you a release manager juggling multiple Jira projects and struggling to keep track of releases across various teams? Say goodbye to the chaos of scattered release management and welcome a new level of efficiency with our Chrome extension, designed specifically for managing Jira releases.

Why Choose This Extension?

Managing releases across multiple Jira projects can be overwhelming. With deadlines to meet, teams to coordinate, and releases to track, it’s easy for things to slip through the cracks. Our Chrome extension provides you with a powerful side panel that brings everything you need into one centralized location—right within your browser.

Key Features:

- Centralized Release Dashboard: View and manage all your releases across multiple Jira projects from a single, intuitive interface. No more switching between projects or getting lost in a sea of tabs. Everything you need is now accessible in one place.

- Quick Creation and Editing: Need to create a new release on the fly? Or update an existing one? With our extension, you can quickly create, edit, and schedule releases directly from the side panel. The user-friendly design makes it easy to update release details, assign versions, and set timelines without leaving your current workflow.

- Efficient Scheduling: Align your release schedule with project milestones and deadlines seamlessly. The extension allows you to schedule releases across different projects with ease, ensuring that all your teams are on the same page.

- Archive and Track Releases: Keep your release management organized by archiving completed or outdated releases. Our extension provides you with a straightforward way to archive and track past releases, so you always have a record of what’s been done, without cluttering your active work.

- Real-Time Synchronization: All changes made in the side panel are instantly synced with Jira, ensuring that your release data is always up-to-date and accurate. No more manual updates or discrepancies between your tools and Jira.

- Copy version reports to clipboard for quick sharing and documentation

Designed for Release Managers:

Whether you’re managing releases for a single team or coordinating complex multi-project deployments, our extension is tailored to fit the unique needs of release managers. It simplifies your workflow, reduces administrative overhead, and helps you stay in control of every aspect of your release management process.

Boost Your Productivity:

By centralizing your release management in a convenient Chrome side panel, this extension helps you streamline your tasks, improve communication across teams, and ensure that every release is delivered on time, every time. Save hours of manual work, reduce the risk of errors, and focus on what matters most—delivering high-quality releases.

Get Started Today:

Transform the way you manage Jira releases and take control of your projects like never before. Install the extension now and experience the future of release management directly in your Chrome browser.
